name: SUSTENANCE
description:
On a far away planet, submerged in water, life is just beginning it's early stages of evolution.  You are one of too many brains of a single organism, fighting the other brains for survival...

An alt-ctrl mini-game for your mouse, made for the 8 Bits to Infinity Mouse Jam, 2-4 players battle for control of a single mouse input to guide the organism and survive to the next round of evolution!Please play nice!  I cannot guarantee the safety of your mouse during play!

Instructions:
  • Each player chooses one of the available brain colors.
  • When the round countdown begins, all players must remove their hands from the mouse, until the countdown is completed.
  • Players fight to use the mouse to guide the organism toward the food that matches their color.  The brain that consumes the least amount of food of their color is eliminated at the end of the round
  • Last brain standing floating is the winner!
  • To Pause: Click and hold the left mouse button for 3 seconds.


Credits and Attributions:
  • Art: Rhaphiel Molinar
  • Music:  Symochi
Additional Sounds Used:
  • balloon deflate by hareball101
  • ppop.wav by Narjara
  • Bubbles.wav by f4ngy
  • Water splash by nilbul
  • underwater ambiance by akemov
